From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The caw of gulls emerged through a cloud, then cut off, as the roar of
firey engines of power cut throught the air. After a while, all was
silent again, and the peaceful birds continued to chirp. Through the
clouds a large metalic form with smoke rising up lay grounded. On closer
inspection a robot lay dangling out the side. Then another large black
one hoisted him up. 

Inside the ship he turned around, his younger brother, Jagged, over his
shoulder, as he looked to Havotron. "Yes sir." his ominous voice drifted
out of his vocals. He did the normal military stance. "Unit Quake
totally functional." he said nodding to Quake. "Unit Jagged in need of
repairs. Unit Needlenose in stasis lock, Unit Apeface, half up, unit
Spinister, uknown." he said, nodding towards Spinister, who lay beneath
wreckage, but not moving. "Unit Slugslinger out of sight, he was not
inside the ship during the crash. He may however be outside." he
whispered. "Jagged and I will need to adopt forms from this planet." he
informed his higher officer.

Spasma leapt down towards his partner Apeface, and opened up a panel to
the chest. He realined a few circuits, then Apeface's body transformed
to his gorilla mode. "uhhhhhhh." he grunted, as Spasma looked up.

"He will be alright, and his wounds will heal normally." the Nebulan
Scientist informed Havotron.

Hook stood up, still clutching his shoulder, and patted Scrapper on the
back. Another job well done, at least for this rable crew. Hook walked
towards the gaping hole of the ship, and took a step off, leaving the
security of solid ground, to wich he slowly fell a few feet, before
hovering in mid air. He floated all the way to the top of the ship, and
looked it over. He would need Scavanger's abilities to better asses the
dammage he thought. "Scavanger, Mixmaster, joing me outside." he called.
